column2:
"I managed to survive that one somehow.
But dude, you'd be freaked out, too, the
first time you saw that thing!"

"It was spawning Darkers like crazy, and
it was pretty strong itself, too. I'm talking
a major hassle."

"I'm pretty sure it was a Briada. I'd be careful
if I were you. Then again, there's probably
nothing to worry about in your case."

"Well, with that, best of luck!
I'll be relieved watching you work over on this monitor!"
